Message:
She was with someone
people called the Pope.

This is the first time someone
other than the professor has come.

I don’t understand why, but...
something doesn’t feel right...

As I stand there silently,
the professor looks at me
and smiles.

The professor apologized.
She was smiling,
but also...crying?

Not the professor’s feelings,
not my feelings...
Nothing.

Frozen in place,
I watch as the Pope
readies her spear.

“The last emotion this
heartless puppet needs
to be complete...is despair.”
